players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Diana was the first one to be eliminated. Let's keep an eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our ranks."
Bob: "I agree with Charlie, we need to be vigilant and keep an eye out for any suspicious behavior. Let's work together to uncover the truth behind Diana's death."
Charlie: "I suggest we all share our observations and suspicions from last night. Let's try to piece together any clues that might help us figure out who the mafia among us is."
